nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello

Class EasyOthelloBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello.OthelloBoard
      • nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello.ContextAwareOthelloBoard
        • nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello.EasyOthelloBoard

  • public class EasyOthelloBoard
extends ContextAwareOthelloBoard
    Easy OthelloBoard implementation which is context aware ( ContextAwareOthelloBoard). This means it is aware of the current player (me) and the enemy. Additionally handles requests for OthelloPosition and provides currently available moves for both players.
    Author:
    Johannes Tandler
